words.translatedSentence: Humans take actions that they can't understand from time to time

words.meaning: to make noise, to make racket, to be noisy

words.translatedSentence: If you make a fuss with me with me

words.sentence: 顔 を 変え られ ない あなた の 方 が 立場 は 不利 よ
words.translatedSentence: You can't change your face, you're more disadvantageous

words.meaning: considerable, great, important, significant, a big deal
words.sentence: 大した 奴 だ
words.translatedSentence: A big guy

words.meaning: to pull out, to take out, to draw out

words.sentence: 里美 も 心配 し て た よ

words.meaning: to attack, to assault, to assail

words.sentence: 押す な 早く あちら に 進め
words.translatedSentence: Don't press it quickly

words.meaning: to mind (negative nuance), to care about, to worry, to pay undue (amount of) attention to (something)
words.sentence: 相手 は 人目 も 気にせ ず 白昼 堂々 と 乗り込ん で 来る よう な ヤツ だ ぞ
words.translatedSentence: The other person is a guy who comes in in the daytime without worrying about the eyes.

words.meaning: always, without exception, necessarily, certainly, without fail, positively, invariably
words.sentence: 逃げ て も 必ず 追って くる ここ で 倒し た ほう が いい
words.translatedSentence: Even if you escape, you will always follow you here, you should defeat it here

words.sentence: それ に 今 なら こっち が 有利 だ
words.translatedSentence: And this is an advantage now

words.sentence: ヤツ は シン イチ の いや 私 の 位置 を 突き止めよ う として いる
words.translatedSentence: He is trying to find out my position in Shinchi

words.sentence: シン イチ は 壁 の 肉 という 盾 で 守ら れ て いる

words.sentence: 近寄る な 僕 から 離れろ

words.meaning: to hurry, to rush, to hasten, to make something happen sooner
words.sentence: とにかく 急い で 避難 し て

words.sentence: 怒る ？ 私 は そんなに 暇 で は ない

words.sentence: まだ 刺し た とき の 感触 が 残ってる

words.meaning: cool, calm, composed, unconcerned, nonchalant, unmoved, indifferent
